Base:Descriptions.Base:Description: This is a portion of a $(this.trait:streetname) $(this.trait:streettype). This area is hemmed in by cornstalks in an attempt to lead you aimlessly to nowhere. $[if(sizeof($this."base:dirs:local") == 0) { return "There are no visible exits.";} else if(sizeof($this."base:dirs:local") == 1) { return "There is a single exit from here to the " +Str($this."base:dirs:local"[0])+ "."; } else if(sizeof($this."base:dirs:local") == 2) { return "The exits from here are to the " +Str($this."base:dirs:local"[0])+ " and the " +Str($this."base:dirs:local"[1])+ "."; } else if(sizeof($this."base:dirs:local") == 3) { return "The exits from here are to the " +Str($this."base:dirs:local"[0])+ ", " +Str($this."base:dirs:local"[2])+ " and the " +Str($this."base:dirs:local"[1])+ "."; } else if(sizeof($this."base:dirs:local") == 4) { return "The exits from here are to the " +Str($this."base:dirs:local"[0])+ ", " +Str($this."base:dirs:local"[2])+ ", " +Str($this."base:dirs:local"[3])+ " and the " +Str($this."base:dirs:local"[1])+ "."; } else if(sizeof($this."base:dirs:local") == 5) { return "The exits from here are to the " +Str($this."base:dirs:local"[0])+ ", " +Str($this."base:dirs:local"[2])+ ", " +Str($this."base:dirs:local"[3])+ ", " +Str($this."base:dirs:local"[4])+ " and the " +Str($this."base:dirs:local"[1])+ "."; } else if(sizeof($this."base:dirs:local") == 6) { return "The exits from here are to the " +Str($this."base:dirs:local"[0])+ ", " +Str($this."base:dirs:local"[2])+ ", " +Str($this."base:dirs:local"[3])+ ", " +Str($this."base:dirs:local"[4])+ ", " +Str($this."base:dirs:local"[5])+ " and the " +Str($this."base:dirs:local"[1])+ "."; } else if(sizeof($this."base:dirs:local") == 7) { return "The exits from here are to the " +Str($this."base:dirs:local"[0])+ ", " +Str($this."base:dirs:local"[2])+ ", " +Str($this."base:dirs:local"[3])+ ", " +Str($this."base:dirs:local"[4])+ ", " +Str($this."base:dirs:local"[5])+ ", " +Str($this."base:dirs:local"[6])+ " and the " +Str($this."base:dirs:local"[1])+ "."; } else if(sizeof($this."base:dirs:local") == 8) { return "The exits from here are to the " +Str($this."base:dirs:local"[0])+ ", " +Str($this."base:dirs:local"[2])+ ", " +Str($this."base:dirs:local"[3])+ ", " +Str($this."base:dirs:local"[4])+ ", " +Str($this."base:dirs:local"[5])+ ", " +Str($this."base:dirs:local"[6])+ ", " +Str($this."base:dirs:local"[7])+ " and the " +Str($this."base:dirs:local"[1])+ "."; } else if(sizeof($this."base:dirs:local") == 9) { return "The exits from here are to the " +Str($this."base:dirs:local"[0])+ ", " +Str($this."base:dirs:local"[2])+ ", " +Str($this."base:dirs:local"[3])+ ", " +Str($this."base:dirs:local"[4])+ ", " +Str($this."base:dirs:local"[5])+ ", " +Str($this."base:dirs:local"[6])+ ", " +Str($this."base:dirs:local"[7])+ ", " +Str($this."base:dirs:local"[8])+ " and the " +Str($this."base:dirs:local"[1])+ "."; } else if(sizeof($this."base:dirs:local") == 10) { return "The exits from here are to the " +Str($this."base:dirs:local"[0])+ ", " +Str($this."base:dirs:local"[2])+ ", " +Str($this."base:dirs:local"[3])+ ", " +Str($this."base:dirs:local"[4])+ ", " +Str($this."base:dirs:local"[5])+ ", " +Str($this."base:dirs:local"[6])+ ", " +Str($this."base:dirs:local"[7])+ ", " +Str($this."base:dirs:local"[8])+ ", " +Str($this."base:dirs:local"[9])+ " and the " +Str($this."base:dirs:local"[1])+ "."; } else { return "There are multiple exits visible."; }]
This is a portion of a $(this.trait:streetname) $(this.trait:streettype). This area is hemmed in by cornstalks in an attempt to lead you aimlessly to nowhere.
The muddy ground appears raked and watered to keep down the dust. Several overlapping footprints mark this passage. The mud looks ideal for forming into balls to be thrown at unsuspecting victims.
The muddy ground appears raked and watered to keep down the dust. Several overlapping footprints mark this passage.
Several footprints are visible in the muck. Due to the large activity in the area, no single print is distinguishable from any others.
Several footprints are visible in the muck.

Core:Properties.Core:Property: X[S] \{Little spiders crawl around in the webs above the corn, their hungry eyes following your every move.\|What was that? Something small, vehement, and growling moves in the corn.\|A frog hops forward from the corn. Realizing he is utterly lost, he despairs, digs a hole for himself, and disappears from sight. A distant QUACK now-and-then signals his presence though.\|Two red dots flare up in the depths of the corn, fixating you with their scorching gaze.\|The leaves bend and twist, crackle, and rustle. A small creature's silhouette flickeringly appears, only to swiftly resume hiding in the shadowy embrace of the maze.\|Nearby and far-away crickets continuously serenade your progress with a chirpy symphony.\|The cornstalks sway to-and-fro, affected by the movement of unseen creatures.\|A long, slithery creature gets momentarily caught beneath your feet and wriggles desperately to escape. It eventually succeeds, disappearing into a nearby row of corn with an irritated hiss.\|A pack of confused skinks weave in and out of the nearby corn rows in a useless attempt to find the exit.\|Small swarms of fireflies flit through the air, occasionally lighting your path with their warm glow.\|An audible crunching sound followed by a noisy breathing pattern can be heard from a not-too-distant patch of corn.\|Something small and lightweight lands on your cheek, briefly tapping your flesh with its antennae before fluttering away.\|A medium-sized frog abruptly emerges from behind a corn stalk, smacking up a fly with its super-long, sticky tongue. Nom nom nom.\|A gathering of ants skitters around the base of a corn stalk, collecting fallen kernels to tote home and feast upon.\|A large brown spider zig-zags back and forth between two corn stalks, gradually building a silky, pumpkin-shaped web.\|A few mosquitoes decide you are too tempting to pass up, and simultaneously land on your body to sink their probes into your flesh and dine upon your blood.\|Frogs gather together to create an original musical composition just for you. Rrrrribbit, rrrribbit, croak, croak.\}

X[S] \{Little spiders crawl around in the webs above the corn, their hungry eyes following your every move.\|What was that? Something small, vehement, and growling moves in the corn.\|A frog hops forward from the corn. Realizing he is utterly lost, he despairs, digs a hole for himself, and disappears from sight. A distant QUACK now-and-then signals his presence though.\|Two red dots flare up in the depths of the corn, fixating you with their scorching gaze.\|The leaves bend and twist, crackle, and rustle. A small creature's silhouette flickeringly appears, only to swiftly resume hiding in the shadowy embrace of the maze.\|Nearby and far-away crickets continuously serenade your progress with a chirpy symphony.\|The cornstalks sway to-and-fro, affected by the movement of unseen creatures.\|A long, slithery creature gets momentarily caught beneath your feet and wriggles desperately to escape. It eventually succeeds, disappearing into a nearby row of corn with an irritated hiss.\|A pack of confused skinks weave in and out of the nearby corn rows in a useless attempt to find the exit.\|Small swarms of fireflies flit through the air, occasionally lighting your path with their warm glow.\|An audible crunching sound followed by a noisy breathing pattern can be heard from a not-too-distant patch of corn.\|Something small and lightweight lands on your cheek, briefly tapping your flesh with its antennae before fluttering away.\|A medium-sized frog abruptly emerges from behind a corn stalk, smacking up a fly with its super-long, sticky tongue. Nom nom nom.\|A gathering of ants skitters around the base of a corn stalk, collecting fallen kernels to tote home and feast upon.\|A large brown spider zig-zags back and forth between two corn stalks, gradually building a silky, pumpkin-shaped web.\|A few mosquitoes decide you are too tempting to pass up, and simultaneously land on your body to sink their probes into your flesh and dine upon your blood.\|Frogs gather together to create an original musical composition just for you. Rrrrribbit, rrrribbit, croak, croak.\|The wind veers ever-so-often, brushing the leaves against each other.\|Once again the wind shifts, composing a symphony of rustling leaves.\|A sudden waft of wind attempts to tear your clothing from your body. Wait, you do have clothing on, don't you?\|The wind gradually dies down, allowing your ears to focus on other sounds around you.\|A paper-like noise rustles into existence with a small gust of wind.\|The wind picks up momentarily, carrying with it the eerie sounds of unseen creatures.\|A warm breath of wind blows through your hair, tousling it with the scent of nature.\|Fragments of leaves fly through the air, sometimes smacking your body before falling to the ground and getting swept up again.\|A flurry of colorful autumn leaves dance upon the breeze, twirling downward to rest upon whatever objects they first meet.\|A strong gust of wind causes a nearby bale of hay to explode into the air. Flaxen straw blows everywhere, littering the ground for as far as the eye can see.\}

X[S] \{The wind veers ever-so-often, brushing the leaves against each other.\|Once again the wind shifts, composing a symphony of rustling leaves.\|A sudden waft of wind attempts to tear your clothing from your body. Wait, you do have clothing on, don't you?\|The wind gradually dies down, allowing your ears to focus on other sounds around you.\|A paper-like noise rustles into existence with a small gust of wind.\|The wind picks up momentarily, carrying with it the eerie sounds of unseen creatures.\|A warm breath of wind blows through your hair, tousling it with the scent of nature.\|Fragments of leaves fly through the air, sometimes smacking your body before falling to the ground and getting swept up again.\|A flurry of colorful autumn leaves dance upon the breeze, twirling downward to rest upon whatever objects they first meet.\|A strong gust of wind causes a nearby bale of hay to explode into the air. Flaxen straw blows everywhere, littering the ground for as far as the eye can see.\}

X[M] if (NRefDetail(\$target) == "ground") \{ \$object = Spawn(\$\{IronClaw:Props:Special:ForFun:Mudball\}); \$object."base:environment" = \$actor; EmitTo(\$actor, "You form a ball of mud from the mucky ground."); EmitIn(\$actor."base:environment", Describe(\$actor)+" forms a ball of mud from the mucky ground.", \$actor); return TRUE; \} else \{ return TRUE; \}

Something small, vehement, and growling moves in the corn.\|A frog hops forward from the corn. Realizing he is utterly lost, he despairs, digs a hole for himself, and disappears from sight.
